New Records: The 2024 White Sox lost 107 games, a new franchise record for losses in a season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 1962 Mets, an expansion team, lost 120 games, the modern record for losses in a season. The 2024 Sox are chasing this record.
Others: The Sox have only won 31 games this season, the fewest runs in baseball at 420. They have only won six series all season but have now been swept 22 times.
